director.name: 约翰尼斯·尼霍姆 Johannes Nyholm

introduction: Isaiah, a commercial film director, is tired of the industry and its superficial consumerism. With the noble determination of saving the planet, he gathers a marginalised crowd of people in an abandoned industrial village to make a film. Gradually it becomes clear that Isaiah also has significantly more primal driving forces, and mutiny breaks out.
